Detailed Description

This file declares useful functions and types for the VISHNU user commands command.

Author:
Ibrahima Cisse (ibrahima.cisse@sysfera.com)

Function Documentation

boost::shared_ptr<Options> makeUserOptions ( std::string  pgName,
std::string &  dietConfig,
privilegeCallBackType &  fPrivilege,
StringcallBackType &  fFirstname,
StringcallBackType &  fLastName,
StringcallBackType &  fEmail,
int  type = 0 
)

To build options for the VISHNU user commands.

Parameters:
pgName : The name of the command
dietConfig,: Represents the VISHNU config file
fPrivilege,: The privilege option callback
fFirstname,: The user first name option callback
fLastName,: The user last name option callback
fEmail,: The user email option callback
type,: Indicates if it is an add or an update command, 0 means update, and 1 means add
Returns:
The description of all options allowed by the command
